numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the percentage of players of color in major sports leagues is very high.
2. 83% of the players in the Women's National Basketball Association are people of color.
3. 83% of the players in the National Basketball Association are people of color.
4. 74% of the players in the National Football League are people of color.
5. This percentage is significantly higher than the percentage in other career fields.
6. However, the percentage of head coaches of color is different.
7. The percentage of head coaches of color ranges from 13% to 30% in major sports leagues.
8. This percentage is very low compared to the percentage of players of color.
9. A person of color is a person who is not white.
10. The percentage in Major League Soccer is surprising to me.
11. The percentage in Major League Soccer is reasonable to me.
12. In Major League Soccer, the percentage is more balanced for players and head coaches.
13. This balance can be explained by the large number of countries that play soccer in the world.
14. I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is significantly lower than the percentage of players of color.
15. When I look at the percentage of head coaches of color, I see that much work is needed.
16. More opportunities should be provided to people of color.
17. These opportunities should allow people of color to coach in major sports leagues.
18. These opportunities should allow people of color to lead in major sports leagues.
19. The headline is: Percentage of people of color in major sports leagues - A huge milestone or still no improvement?
